category.title: Cuts to Teaching
category.description: Examples: cuts that impact teaching quality, including cuts to teaching positions, increases in class size, etc.

category.title: Cuts to Programs and Curricula
category.description: Examples: cuts to academic, art, music programs and college access programs, etc.

category.title: Cuts to Student Supports
category.description: Examples: cuts to specialized staff (aids, coaches); counseling and tutoring, etc.

category.title: Cuts to Transportation
category.description: Examples: cuts to bus stops, bus routes, field trips, etc.

category.title: Cuts to Leadership/Governance
category.description: Examples: cuts to principal, vice principal, department chair positions, etc.

category.title: Cuts to Family Engagement
category.description: Examples: cuts to parent involvement staff, activities, and travel for parent conferences; cuts that impact school-family partnership

category.title: Other Concerns
category.description: Other issues of concern that impact educational excellence and equity
